title: GitHub Integrates Claude & Codex AI Agents
description: GitHub integrated Claude and Codex AI programming agents into Copilot Pro Plus and Enterprise tiers, supporting multi-model collaborative development.

title: OpenAI Codex CLI GPT-5.2 Integration
description: Codex CLI upgraded to GPT-5.2-Codex model with 40% faster inference, 400K token input support, and 50+ programming languages. New macOS desktop application and JetBrains integration.

community_feedback.quote: Shifted from code completion to 'AI collaborator' with project-level understanding

title: Claude Opus 4.6 Fast Mode Integration
description: Integration with Claude Opus 4.6 model featuring 1M token context window, 128K max output, and adaptive thinking mechanism.

title: VS Code v1.109 (February 2026)
description: Multi-agent development capabilities, improved chat experience, agent conversation management, and Claude agent support with MCP applications.
